parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name for which you want to set the DNSSEC status.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language in which you want the values of some response parameters to be returned. These response parameters support multiple languages. Default value: en. Valid values: en, zh, and ja.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The DNSSEC status. Valid values:

*   ON: enables DNSSEC for the domain name.
*   OFF: disables DNSSEC for the domain name.
